description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Salad Bowl With Crispy Chickpeas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Low salt,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Budget,Summer,Stone fruit,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Chicken,Low fat,Spinach
name: Chicken Salad Bowl With Crispy Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup no addedsalt tinned chickpeas, drained well
1 slices wholemeal bread, cut into croutons

recipeInstructions.text: To prepare the snack, preheat oven to 180oC. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Rub the chickpeas between paper towel to roughen. Bake for 10 minutes or until crisp. Sprinkle yoghurt with cumin and set aside with chickpeas until ready to serve.
Combine salad ingredients and serve with prepared snack and nectarine.
